No busca ser reconocido como una ‚Äúestrella‚Äù y la mayor√≠a de las veces escapa de las situaciones en las que pueda ser identificado por el p√∫blico. EVENT NAME: Mural Arts Workshop with Street Artist REB
EVENT DESCRIPTION:
Join street artist Reb ( Vassilis Rebelos ) for an introductory course on MURALISM this Saturday December 2nd at Nau Bostik from 11:00AM to 1:00PM.

The objectives of this Workshop are to learn Reb‚Äôs process of creating a mural and then applying this directly unto a wall.

Reb will guide us through the process and you will be able to take home one of his prints!

All materials and a light snack will be provided!

- Cost: ‚Ç¨38.00 (includes all materials + a print by Reb) / Send us a Private Message to book!

-----

√önete al muralista griego Reb para un Taller introductorio de MURALISM este s√°bado 2 de diciembre en la Nau Bostik de 11:00AM a 1:00PM.

Los objetivos de este Taller son conocer el proceso que conlleva crear un mural y luego aplicar esta t√©cnica a la pared.

Reb nos guiar√° en el proceso y te podr√°s llevar a casa una de sus laminas!

H O R A R I O

De 11:00 a 12:00 intro e introducci√≥n para trabajo mural
12:00 a 12:15 refrigerio y repartir l√°minas
12:15 a 14:00 creaci√≥n de mural

About REB:

Reb born, raised and studied in Thessaloniki, Greece.
He starts vandalizing walls since he was a baby and follows painting and drawing lessons. After watching ‚ÄúSTYLEWARS‚Äùin 1991, he gets more focused to the phenomenon called graffiti, while at the same time he gets involved with comics, tattoos, and graphic design.
In August 2002, he establishes the only Graffiti-Street Art shop in Thessaloniki, MWC Graffiti and Design, that manages and coordinates until today.
In his agenda, we find a number of participation in graffiti festivals and exhibitions like Chromopolis, Meeting of Styles, MWC Jam, Athens Biennale, etc...
Beside schools and street walls, you can meet Reb‚Äôs work indoor for companies and institutions such as TITAN cement, Goethe Institute Athens, Smirnoff, Gordon‚Äôs space, Algida, Fenafresh, etc...
In October 2015 he finished his biggest project so far at TITAN Thessaloniki, directing and realizing a scenery of over 2.500 sm on the surface of a cement plant building.
At this moment he is painting the walls of Barcelona, wishing to everyone a colorful life.
